General.Name: G.M.I Technology Inc
General.Description: GMI Technology Inc. operates as an electronic components distributor and applications solutions provider worldwide. It offers range of products, including consumer electronics, home appliances, information technology and networking, data and telecommunications, industrial, and power solutions. The company also provides various applications solutions comprising Internet of Things, Bluetooth speaker, smart voice control, android smart TV box solution, car ethernet, SSD, and type C, as well as BLDC range hood solutions and small appliances. In addition, it offers marketing, design, FAE, logistics and VMI, and payment gateway VAT services. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
